Title: Lonelyhearts
Plot: After investigating a strange cluster of female deaths and disappearances, Nick sends Monroe undercover to get a whiff of a hypnotic suspect. In the meantime, a stranger shows up looking to avenge the death of his friend at the hands of a Grimm, but he'll have to get past Captain Renard.
GuestStars: Patrick Fischler, Sharon Sachs, Henri Lubatti, Haley Talbot, Bevin Kaye, Lanie Hoyo
